author: jdcasey
msg: All ITs run, and I'm including a new feature to allow assembly descriptors and assembly-components to be deployed then resolved again as artifacts. This enables reuse of standard assembly descriptors/components. There is a new IT to test it, and all other ITs pass, including the repository-assembly now (due to fixes in the maven-repository-builder).

author: psmith
msg: Bug 42833 Added ability to hide Welcome and Drag and Drop panels.

author: jdcasey
msg: Fixing problem with a field in the project builder that isn't there in 2.1-snapshot...just trapping the NoSuchFieldException.

author: jdcasey
msg: Changing package to reflect wider plugin role.
